item.text: When Israel lived in Shittim, the people began to commit sexual immorality with the daughters of Moab.

These women <st data-num="07121" class="">invited</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> to the <st data-num="02077" class="">sacrifices</st> of their <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>; then the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">ate</st> and <st data-num="07812" class="">bowed down</st> to their <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>.<n id="2" />
When Israel joined themselves to Baal Peor, the anger of the Lord flared up against Israel.
The Lord said to Moses, “Arrest all the leaders of the people, and hang them up before the Lord in broad daylight, so that the fierce anger of the Lord may be turned away from Israel.”
So Moses said to the judges of Israel, “Each of you must execute those of his men who were joined to Baal Peor.”

Just then one of the Israelites came and brought to his brothers a Midianite woman in the plain view of Moses and of the whole community of the Israelites, while they were weeping at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

When <st data-num="06372" class="">Phinehas</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0499" class="">Eleazar</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> it,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> from <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="05712" class="">assembly</st>, <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="07420" class="">javelin</st> in his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>,

and <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="06898" class="">tent</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01856" class="">thrust through</st> the <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> and <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="0802">woman’s</st> <st data-num="06897" class="">abdomen</st>.<n id="2" /> So the <st data-num="04046" class="">plague</st> was <st data-num="06113" class="">stopped</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>.<n id="3" />
Those that died in the plague were 24,000.
The Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="06372" class="">Phinehas</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0499" class="">Eleazar</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>, has <st data-num="07725" class="">turned</st> my <st data-num="02534" class="">anger</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">away</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>, when he <st data-num="07068" class="">manifested</st> such <st data-num="07068" class="">zeal</st><n id="1" /> for my sake <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> them, so that I did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03615" class="">consume</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> in my <st data-num="07068" class="">zeal</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="03651" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">announce</st>:<n id="1" /> ‘I <st data-num="02005" class="">am going</st> to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st><n id="2" /> to him my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> of <st data-num="07965" class="">peace</st>.<n id="3" />
So it will be to him and his descendants after him a covenant of a permanent priesthood, because he has been zealous for his God, and has made atonement for the Israelites.’”
Now the name of the Israelite who was stabbed—the one who was stabbed with the Midianite woman—was Zimri son of Salu, a leader of a clan of the Simeonites.
The name of the Midianite woman who was killed was Cozbi daughter of Zur. He was a leader over the people of a clan of Midian.
Then the Lord spoke to Moses:
“<st data-num="06887" class="">Bring trouble</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="04084" class="">Midianites</st>, and <st data-num="05221" class="">destroy</st> them,

because they bring trouble to you by their treachery with which they have deceived you in the matter of Peor, and in the matter of Cozbi, the daughter of a prince of Midian, their sister, who was killed on the day of the plague that happened as a result of Peor.”
